mapper.select: select t.*, m.id as module_id, m.name as module_name, u.id as creater_id, u.chinese_name as creater_chinese_name, u.english_name as creater_english_name, pr.id as priority_id, pr.name as priority_name, sp.id as stage_id, sp.name as stage_name from t_task t left join t_module m on t.module_id = m.id left join t_user u on u.id = t.creater_id left join t_priority pr on pr.id = t.priority_id left join t_stage_project sp on sp.id = t.stage_id where t.id = #{taskId}

select t.id, t.name, t.update_time, t.deadline, sp.name as stage_name, pr.name as priority_name from t_task t left join t_stage_project sp on sp.id = t.stage_id left join t_priority pr on pr.id = t.priority_id where t.module_id = #{moduleId}

select t.id, t.name, t.update_time, t.deadline, sp.name as stage_name, pr.name as priority_name from t_task t left join t_stage_project sp on sp.id = t.stage_id left join t_priority pr on pr.id = t.priority_id
left join t_task_manager t_ma on t_ma.task_id = t.id left join t_task_member t_me on t_me.task_id = t.id where t.module_id = #{moduleId} and (t.creater_id = #{userId} or t_ma.manager_id = #{userId} or t_me.member_id = #{userId})
mapper.insert: insert into t_task (name, module_id, deadline, creater_id, priority_id, stage_id) values (#{name}, #{moduleId}, #{deadline}, #{createrId}, #{priorityId}, #{stageId})
